function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive identification of human SARS-CoV-2 by means of RT-qPCR","Impact":"Potential spread of SARS-CoV-2 in the environment","Mitigation":"Confirming positive RT-qPCR results with additional verification methods","Technologies":"Sequencing, Sanger sequencing","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, wastewater treatment plant workers","Owner":"Laboratories, research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Higher SARS-CoV-2 RNA copy number in solid-phase reservoir of wastewater samples","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to SARS-CoV-2 during wastewater treatment processes","Mitigation":"Implementing proper safety protocols for handling and processing wastewater samples","Technologies":"Centrifugation, wastewater treatment methods","People":"Wastewater treatment plant workers, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Wastewater treatment plants, research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
